mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.name, e.phone, e.email, e.adress, e.emergency_number as emergencyNumber, e.hire_date as hireDate, j.name as jobName FROM employee e LEFT JOIN m_job j ON e.job_code = j.id WHERE e.id = #{id}
SELECT company_name as companyName, work_period as workPeriod, task FROM employee_career WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} ORDER BY id ASC
